page.pageName: Stream for VOD - new solutions page

metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare Stream is a cost-effective VOD platform that provides a better solution to meet video on-demand needs. Simplify ABR workflows with just one API

relatedBlades.title: Deliver high-quality video on-demand with one API
relatedBlades.subtitle: Upload, store, encode, and deliver on-demand videos with Cloudflare Stream
relatedBlades.copy:
Get started with [Cloudflare Stream](https://www.cloudflare.com/products/cloudflare-stream/) — the unified VOD platform.

- Automatically deliver high-quality video at the ideal resolution for a wide variety of devices 
- Pay only for minutes of video delivered and stored — not for encoding or bandwidth
- Integrate with any HLS- or DASH-supported video player

Rapidly build better video on-demand experiences — without needing special format, protocol, or encoding expertise. Take control of your video infrastructure now.

relatedBlades.subtitle: WHY CHOOSE CLOUDFLARE AS YOUR VOD SOLUTION?

features.title: Simplified workflows
features.description: Leave the heavy lift of storing, encoding, and playing on-demand videos to Cloudflare Stream. Focus your development efforts on content — instead of learning new protocols, video formats, or encoding pipelines. Stream takes care of it all with one API.

features.title: Optimize at scale
features.description: Automatically give each visitor the ideal video experience for their device with [adaptive bitrate streaming](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/video/what-is-adaptive-bitrate-streaming/). And Cloudflare's global network spans %{DataCenterCount} cities across %{CountryCount} countries, ensuring the fastest delivery of high-quality video content.

features.title: Cost-effective streaming
features.description: Some [video CDNs](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/video/what-is-video-cdn/) make it expensive to store and deliver videos. Stream uses the [Cloudflare CDN](https://www.cloudflare.com/application-services/products/cdn/) to cache and serve content from our own data centers. Pay only for minutes of video delivered and minutes of video stored — there are no additional charges for encoding or bandwidth.

relatedBlades.quote: "I think most people don't realize just how complicated video hosting and distribution is ... what Cloudflare Stream allowed us to do is just give us an out-of-the-box solution for just providing video streaming to our users."

quoteCarousel.quote: "Before we could choose from three bitrates but it was a one-time decision. Now, Stream changes rate dynamically and eliminates stall and jitter and improves our customer experience."
"Once we moved our video catalog over to Stream, user complaints about video quality pretty much went away."

relatedBlades.title: Effortlessly upload, store, encode, and deliver video
relatedBlades.copy:
- __Eliminate the development burden__ of choosing codecs, protocols, and bitrates for your video content.
- __Generate thumbnail previews__ in static or animated formats — no coding required.
- __Editing features put you in control__ — [add captions](https://developers.cloudflare.com/stream/edit-videos/adding-captions/), [apply watermarks](https://developers.cloudflare.com/stream/edit-videos/applying-watermarks/), [clip videos](https://developers.cloudflare.com/stream/edit-videos/video-clipping/), and more.
- __Cost-effective video delivery__ means only paying for minutes of video delivered and stored; never pay additional charges for encoding or bandwidth again.

button.elementName: Simplified VOD With One API - button

relatedBlades.title: Deliver better video experiences
relatedBlades.copy:
- __Automatically deliver the ideal playback resolution__ for each individual viewer, no matter their device or bandwidth constraints.
- __Wide compatibility__ allows you to stream video to websites, native iOS and Android apps, and media streaming devices.
- __Enjoy short video startup times__ and reduced buffering.

features.title: Online learning
features.description: Build internal or external e-learning video applications that offer adaptive bitrate streaming, offline viewing, and [advanced security](https://developers.cloudflare.com/stream/viewing-videos/securing-your-stream?cf_target_id=A3AFEEAE5E84E52DE94825EB6DE2B484). Easily restrict certain videos to certain users, or for a limited time period.

features.title: Video ads
features.description: Including a video on a landing page can increase conversions by more than 80%. Serve ads before, during, or after videos using the Video Advertising Serving Template (VAST) format.

features.title: Video analytics
features.description: Stream provides server-side [analytics](https://developers.cloudflare.com/stream/getting-analytics/) for any player of your choosing. Identify the most-used video content, where and when content is viewed, and other trend analysis to optimize your video strategy.

features.title: Cost-effective streaming
features.description: Don't compromise high-quality playback to save on bandwidth costs. With Stream, you only pay for minutes of video delivered and stored. There are no charges for encoding or bandwidth.

relatedBlades.title: A new video experience powered by Stream
relatedBlades.copy:
In addition to using Cloudflare's security suite, Flo — the popular female health app — leverages Cloudflare to reach a premium subscriber audience with exclusive video content. 

Stream gives Flo a platform to manage and deliver video at scale with full control, including a Flo-branded video player. 

View the customer story [here](https://www.cloudflare.com/case-studies/womens-health-app-flo-safeguards-customer-data/).

relatedBlades.title: Encoding, global delivery, and player all in one VOD platform

buttonOne.elementName: Encoding, global delivery, and player all in one VOD platform - enablement

features.title: Live streaming, simulcasting and on-demand streaming
Video Player with support for VAST Ad Tags
All the features of Cloudflare Stream and Cloudflare Images
Store up to 100,000 images and 1,000 minutes of video content
Deliver up to 500,000 images and 5,000 minutes of video content each month
All the features of Cloudflare Stream and Cloudflare Images
Store up to 500,000 images and 10,000 minutes of video content
Deliver up to 1,000,000 images and 50,000 minutes of video content each month
Case study: Business of Design
features.description: Kimberly Seldon is a Toronto-based interior designer that is well-known in the design world.

features.title: Case study: PhonePe
features.description: Using Cloudflare, PhonePe provides a frictionless and low-latency customer experience to more than 400 million registered users.

features.title: Case study: Padlet
features.description: Padlet simplifies video delivery with Cloudflare Stream.

features.title: Business and Pro customers get bundled streaming video
features.description: All Cloudflare customers with a Biz or Pro domain are able to store up to 100 minutes of video content and deliver up to 10,000 minutes of video content each month at no additional cost.

features.title: Introducing scheduled deletion for Cloudflare Stream
features.description: Scheduled deletion from Cloudflare Stream simplifies video storage management and reduces costs, whether you need to retain recordings from a live stream for only a limited time, or preserve direct creator videos for a set duration.

features.title: Build, deploy, and run applications on Cloudflare
features.description: With the Cloudflare Developer Platform, scale, performance, security, and reliability are on by-default. Code without worrying about infrastructure decisions, egress fees, or how many seats are needed for your team.

relatedBlades.title: Trusted by millions of Internet properties
